We respect your privacy and are committe: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this privacy policy (“Policy”).
This Policy describes the types of infor: This Policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide (“Personal Information”) on the fanZ website (“Website”), “fanzapp.io” mobile application (“Mobile Application”), and any of their related products and services (collectively, “Services”), and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that Personal Information.

component.QuestionComponent.question: How to earn coinZ & points ?
component.QuestionComponent.answer: By predicting matches results and referring friends and daily sign in to the app
component.QuestionComponent.question2: What is the benefit of coinZ
component.QuestionComponent.answer2: You can purchase products & gift cards using your coins in our store
component.QuestionComponent.question3: What is the benefit of points
component.QuestionComponent.answer3: Your points reflect your activity in the app and when you earn more points, you level up
component.QuestionComponent.answer4: By earning points from predicting matches results and from challenges
component.QuestionComponent.question5: How to buy from the store
component.QuestionComponent.answer5: After collecting enough coinZ, you can go to our in-app store to choose the product you would like to buy and then swipe to place your order. You will then be taken to a WhatsApp chat with fanZ customer success team to send a message and then our team will fulfill your order.
